ygData.subject: Sorry I took so long to get back
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought for a long time that this E-club had been disbanded, but I got an e-mail a few weeks back that that was not the case at all! Please allow me to
ygData.messageBody:
I thought for a long time that this E-club had
been disbanded, but I got an e-mail a few weeks back
that that was not the case at all! Please allow me to
reintroduce myself.<br><br>I am Foleen Defraidy, L49 Paladin.
My current list of character names/levels
is:<br>Foleen<br>Villiage Iddiot (33 enchanter)<br>Khonhaid Stonehead (24
warrior)<br>Phathung Leow (21 monk)<br>Revrind (15 cleric)<br>Tiajuana
(8 necro)<br>Spyvs (5 rogue)<br><br>Way back when I
first signed up here, there were very few members. The
names I remember are Jonquil, Smoothie, and Zalt. I
still talk to Smoothie on rare occaisions, but it's
been quite some time since I saw Jonquil on line at
all. I continue to be drawn ever deeper into EQ. I
even managed to get my wife addicted so I can play
more!<br><br>So where have I been?<br><br>Back in January, 2000,
I joined up with Core Alliance. I have been in that
guild ever since, and have somehow managed to become
the guild leader, a position I have held since
November of last year. We were once one of the most
powerful on the server, but as so often happens, a guild
grows too fast, and melts down. Wing of the Phoenix,
and Wayward Kin were both guilds that were formed by
splits from Core Alliance. Currently, we are about 30
members strong with half in the 40's and half in the 20's
and a few in between.<br><br>I have been distant from
things like this e-club because when I'm at home I wanna
PLAY!! I usually did all the extra stuff like message
boards and guild work when I had down time at work. In
this new world of downsizing, I've had very little
time at work for 'discretionary' occupations. Somehow
I manage every once in a while. <br><br>Well,
that's about all for now. I'm still out there. Send me a
tell if you happen to see me on!<br><br>Foley
